item.title: Python编码规范
item.description: 函数返回值定义 # 多个返回值 - Tuple # async def function_name(package_name: str) -> Tuple[ParamsPushLvl2Pool, bool]: pass 支持传入多类型 - Union # ex: Union[ExpiryT, None] = None, 迭代 # def _yield_offer_info(_session, from_days_ago: int) -> Iterator[Offer]:
